query:
ALTER TABLE ai_personas 
ADD COLUMN layoutStyle VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'minimal' NOT NULL AFTER primaryColor,
ADD COLUMN backgroundImageUrl VARCHAR(512) AFTER layoutStyle,
ADD COLUMN profilePhotoUrl VARCHAR(512) AFTER backgroundImageUrl,
ADD COLUMN tagline VARCHAR(255) AFTER profilePhotoUrl,
ADD COLUMN suggestedQuestions TEXT AFTER tagline,
ADD COLUMN showQuickButtons BOOLEAN DEFAULT true NOT NULL AFTER suggestedQuestions,
ADD COLUMN chatPlaceholder VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT '輸入您的問題...' AFTER showQuickButtons;
